alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 28 at 5:09AM AKDT until August 29 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight AKDT Monday night. * IMPACTS...Beach and coastal erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will increase to 40 to 55 mph late this morning and continue into this evening. These winds will push waves to the top of the beach causing erosion and washing away items left on the beach. Winds and waves will decrease late tonight.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
